resources.string: This app needs the following permissions to demonstrate its features:
Wake Lock: To keep screen awake during PIN entry
Vibrate: For haptic feedback on PIN keypad
This demo requires the requested permissions to function properly. Please grant them to continue.
This is a demonstration lock screen for educational purposes only. It does not provide system-level security. You can still use your device power button to lock the screen normally.
Demo completed successfully. Thank you for trying this app!
